text: Fierce Ruling Diva is a Dutch house music duo from Amsterdam consisting of producers Jeroen Flamman and Jeff Porter. ==Biography== In the early nineties they charted three songs on the Hot Dance Music/Club Play chart, the most of successful of which was "You Gotta Believe," a #4 hit in 1992. Ten years later that track was remixed and in 2002 it re-entered the dance chart and hit #1. ==See also== *List of number-one dance hits (United States) *List of artists who reached number one on the US Dance chart ==References== Category:Dutch house music groups
title: Fierce Ruling Diva
